name: Aetherspace
description: Aetherspace is a game about turn-based battles between outlaw gangs. In space. With starships.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any graphics card with DX11 feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2500 CPU @ 3.30GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
